amendment.description: Amendment to the Honda amendment (A001) sought to clarify that materials, exhibits, and multimedia presentations shall reflect the diversity of scientific opinion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert a new paragraph after paragraph 1 of the Honda amendment to clarify what such materials, exhibits, and multimedia presentations shall reflect.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Sullivan to the Honda amendment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sullivan amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 250 (Roll no. 287).
